title: Looking for fun, cool, interesting vector-based patterns.
content:
Hello,

I am searching for really interesting patterns that are vector based (ones that I can modify in Illustrator, etc.). I have done a quick search and found good examples at [www.iStockphoto.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20061126102714/http:/www.istockphoto.com/), but am curious to see what else is available.

Any ideas?

Thanks!  
J
author: justinole

comments.content:
ya but you’re looking for something which is free. right?  
otherwise there are lots of websites who sales readymade patterns(EPS,ai formats).  
 [http://www.ultimatesymbol.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20061126102714/http:/www.ultimatesymbol.com/)
[www.shutterstock.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20061126102714/http:/www.shutterstock.com/) has some really nice vector stuff.
Check out [You Work For Them](http://web.archive.org/web/20061126102714/http:/youworkforthem.com/), they have a bunch of collections that are all available for really reasonable prices.

thanks guys….the “you work for them” site is great!

j
